name: Log-CS
short_description:
Log-CS is a tool for sending logfiles over the net via TCP.
This tool contains to applications:

LogClient:
The LogClient is responsible for sending the logfile over the net.

LogServer:
The LogServer listens on a choosen port for logfiles.
